decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (D-0001 Rev P4; D-0002 Rev P3; D-0003 Rev P2; D-0004 Rev P1; D-1099 Rev P5; D-0099 Rev P4; D-1100 Rev P5; D-0100 Rev P7; D-1101 Rev P5; D-0101 Rev P6; D-0200 Rev P4; D-0201 Rev P3; D-0203 Rev P2; D-0204 Rev P2; D-0206 Rev P3; D-0207 Rev P2; D-0209 Rev P2; D-0210 Rev P2; D-0212 Rev P3; D-0213 Rev P2; D-0215 Rev P3; D-0216 Rev P2; D-0217 Rev P3; D-0218 Rev P3; D-0219 Rev P3; D-0220 Rev P3; Planning Statement; Received: 24/11/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - Details of a fume extraction ducting system shall be shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority prior to the occupation of the A3 use.  The approved details shall be implemented prior to the commencement of the restaurant and retained thereafter.
Condition : 5 - The A3 use hereby permitted shall not be open to customers outside the following times [09:00 - 23.30 Mondays to Saturdays, 09:00 - 22:00 Sundays and Bank Holidays].
description: Change of use of the former Post Office to a mixed use comprising of (i) A1 and/or A3 use; and (ii) B8 use to extend the existing Royal Mail Delivery Office and facilitate the relocation of the existing Royal Mail Customer Service Point into the former Post Office; with the construction of a new pedestrian entrance onto Matisse Road.
